    try {
        var ddApiUserID = gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID");
        var userIDIncoming = current.sys_created_by;
        if (userIDIncoming !== ddApiUserID) {
			gs.setProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID", userIDIncoming);
        }
    } catch (ex) {
        gs.error("Error: " + ex);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-21 13:40:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>19479646974102107d1ff93de053af77</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set apiUserID Case Incident</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_19479646974102107d1ff93de053af77</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-21 13:40:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=19479646974102107d1ff93de053af77"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_85add1addbf32200c1e6771ebf9619ac
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITSM Transform Map">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
  /**
  *  This is an example of a regex search on a monitor entry.
  *  If you have urgency defined in the text of your alert, then you can search for it with a regex.
  *  assume the alert text would look something like this:
  *
  *  Oh no, something bad happened
  *  Urgency: 3
  *  Too many bad things happened!
  *
  **/

  var urgency = "";
  var re = /Urgency:\s([0-9])/g;
  var m = re.exec(source.text_only_msg);
  // If there is no match, m will be null;
  if (m) {
    if (m.length == 2) {
      urgency = m[1];
    }
  }
	return urgency; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);
]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-12-19 18:49:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>85add1addbf32200c1e6771ebf9619ac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_85add1addbf32200c1e6771ebf9619ac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-17 19:48:53</sys_updated_on><target_field>urgency</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

	return "";

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_577eb25e33305290946d955a7e5c7b71
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Templated Monitors ITSM Transform Map">5b7e3e1e33305290946d955a7e5c7b31</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>urgency</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
  /**
  *  This is an example of a regex search on a monitor entry.
  *  If you have urgency defined in the text of your alert, then you can search for it with a regex.
  *  assume the alert text would look something like this:
  *
  *  Oh no, something bad happened
  *  Urgency: 3
  *  Too many bad things happened!
  *
  **/

  var urgency = "";
  var re = /Urgency:\s([0-9])/g;
  var m = re.exec(source.text_only_msg);
  // If there is no match, m will be null;
  if (m) {
    if (m.length == 2) {
      urgency = m[1];
    }
  }
	return urgency; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);
]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_templated_monitors_itsm</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-24 21:04:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>577eb25e33305290946d955a7e5c7b71</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>urgency</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_577eb25e33305290946d955a7e5c7b71</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-24 21:11:47</sys_updated_on><target_field>urgency</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>false</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITSM Transform Map">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

	var msg = source.text_only_msg;

	return msg.replace(/\\n/g, '\n');

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-21 03:29:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>83b34e54db536200c1e6771ebf9619af</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_83b34e54db536200c1e6771ebf9619af</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-01-07 00:31:42</sys_updated_on><target_field>description</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITSM Transform Map">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

    var int_severity = 4;

	if (source.priority == 'normal')
		int_severity = 1;
	else if (source.priority == 'all')
		int_severity = 2;
	else if (source.priority == 'low')
		int_severity = 3;

	return int_severity; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-11-18 19:01:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>6d5c3963db472200c1e6771ebf9619bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_6d5c3963db472200c1e6771ebf9619bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-23 18:20:16</sys_updated_on><target_field>priority</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

// checks to see if the em_event plugin is installed before running
	var eventGR = new GlideRecord('em_event');
	if(!eventGR.isValid()){
		ignore = true;
	}
})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-14 17:40:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>f76d78ad477a86143d4f6050706d438c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onStart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_f76d78ad477a86143d4f6050706d438c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-14 17:40:18</sys_updated_on><when>onStart</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_17be0a42974102107d1ff93de053afcf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_datad_datadog.DatadogAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Server-side script for reading & writing Datadog ITOM/ITSM properties.</description><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>DatadogAjax</name><sandbox_callable>true</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var DatadogAjax = Class.create();
DatadogAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	/**
	 * Loads all of the Datadog sys properties
	 */
	getConfigSettings: function () {
		var sysProperties = new GlideRecordSecure('sys_properties');
		sysProperties.addQuery('sys_package.name', 'ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog');
		sysProperties.query();

		var objs = new Array();
		while (sysProperties.next()) {
			var prop = toProperty(sysProperties);
			objs.push(prop);

			if (prop.type === "password2") {
				var isSetProp = {};
				isSetProp.name = "_" + prop.name.split(".")[1] + "Set";
				isSetProp.type = "true | false";
				isSetProp.value = prop.value && (prop.value.trim().length > 0);
				objs.push(isSetProp);
			}
		}

		return JSON.stringify(objs);
	},
	/**
	 * Updates the Datadog sys property values
	 */
	saveConfigSettigs: function () {
		var result = {};
		var props = ["datacenter", "apiKey", "applicationKey", "syncEnabled"];
		var updatedProps = [];
		try {
			for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) {
				var val = this.getParameter("sysparam_" + props[i]);
				if (val) {
					gs.setProperty("x_datad_datadog." + props[i], val);
					updatedProps.push(props[i]);
				}
			}
			result.success = true;
			gs.info("Updated properties: {0}", updatedProps.join(", "));
		} catch (error) {
			gs.error("Datadog: Failed to save config settings: {0}", error);
			result.success = false;
		}

		return JSON.stringify(result);
	},
	type: 'DatadogAjax'
});

function toProperty(record) {
	var property = {};
	property["name"] = record["name"].getDisplayValue();
	property["type"] = record["type"].getDisplayValue();
	if (record["type"].getDisplayValue() === "true | false") {
		property["value"] = record["value"].getDisplayValue() === "true";
	} else {
		property["value"] = record["value"].getDisplayValue();
	}

	return property;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-21 13:02:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>17be0a42974102107d1ff93de053afcf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DatadogAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_17be0a42974102107d1ff93de053afcf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-21 13:02:38</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Templated Monitors ITSM Transform Map">5b7e3e1e33305290946d955a7e5c7b31</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>business_service_sys_id</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_2743b9452fbb3010f75ef7ecf699b6f1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITSM Transform Map">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
  /**
  *  This is an example of a regex search on a monitor entry.
  *  If you have impact defined in the text of your alert, then you can search for it with a regex.
  *  assume the alert text would look something like this:
  *
  *  Oh no, something bad happened
  *  Impact: 3
  *  Too many bad things happened!
  *
  **/

  var impact = "";
  var re = /Impact:\s([0-9])/g;
  var m = re.exec(source.text_only_msg);
  // If there is no match, m will be null;
  if (m) {
    if (m.length == 2) {
      impact = m[1];
    }
  }
	return impact; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);
]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-11 20:26:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>2743b9452fbb3010f75ef7ecf699b6f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_2743b9452fbb3010f75ef7ecf699b6f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-17 19:48:33</sys_updated_on><target_field>impact</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_datad_datadog_case_event_table</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Set apiUserID Case Event</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    try {
        var ddApiUserID = gs.getProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID");
        var userIDIncoming = current.sys_created_by;
        if (userIDIncoming !== ddApiUserID) {
			gs.setProperty("x_datad_datadog.apiUserID", userIDIncoming);
        }
    } catch (ex) {
        gs.error("Error: " + ex);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-21 13:38:57</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2f945e86974102107d1ff93de053afb3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set apiUserID Case Event</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2f945e86974102107d1ff93de053afb3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-21 13:38:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async_always</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2f945e86974102107d1ff93de053afb3"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITSM Transform Map">daf0a5cddb872200c1e6771ebf96198c</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

	if(source.ticket_state == 'Resolved') {
		return 1; // code for Solved Permanently
	}
	return "";

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_incident_table</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-11-06 20:42:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>20383be6dba12300a6ac1780399619f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_20383be6dba12300a6ac1780399619f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-23 18:19:59</sys_updated_on><target_field>close_code</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Monitors ITOM Transform Map">37a065cddb872200c1e6771ebf9619ac</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_entry_9f7e3e1e33305290946d955a7e5c7b39
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Datadog Templated Monitors ITSM Transform Map">5b7e3e1e33305290946d955a7e5c7b31</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>impact</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {
  /**
  *  This is an example of a regex search on a monitor entry.
  *  If you have impact defined in the text of your alert, then you can search for it with a regex.
  *  assume the alert text would look something like this:
  *
  *  Oh no, something bad happened
  *  Impact: 3
  *  Too many bad things happened!
  *
  **/

  var impact = "";
  var re = /Impact:\s([0-9])/g;
  var m = re.exec(source.text_only_msg);
  // If there is no match, m will be null;
  if (m) {
    if (m.length == 2) {
      impact = m[1];
    }
  }
	return impact; // return the value to be put into the target field

})(source);
]]></source_script><source_table>x_datad_datadog_templated_monitors_itsm</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-24 21:04:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>9f7e3e1e33305290946d955a7e5c7b39</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>impact</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ITOM/ITSM Integration for Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_9f7e3e1e33305290946d955a7e5c7b39</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-24 21:13:38</sys_updated_on><target_field>impact</target_field><target_table>incident</target_table><use_source_script>false</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

	// Checks to see if the em_event table is available/installed before running

			ignore = true;
